name: Grave Mistakes (Arban Hossain)
description:
Mini Jam 122 Late Submission.

Only 6 levels, plan on adding more. Only supports 800x600 resolution.

Todo:

  • At least 30 levels for early access.
  • Music
  • QoL changes

Known Bugs:

- Player collider might get stuck with a tombstone. Hit Space to restart for now.
